English .
Akkasah: Photography Archive (NYU Abu Dhabi)
'Postcards and Snapshots of Syria, Lebanon, Palestine and Egypt' - Hisham Khatib Collection
Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
Unknown
AD.MC.030_ref173 40
58 Photographic Prints 58 postcards and photographic prints over 20 pages of an album
Circa 1910-1920 Generally good, some brittle and warped. Electronic Records AD_MC_30_ref173
Content Description
Digital surrogates of 58 photographs and postcards focused on Palestine, Jordan, Syria, Lebanon and and Egypt as well as a very small number from Europe. Some postcard publishers are identified, most are unknown.
Photographic Prints Gelatin Silver Prints Palestine Jordan Egypt Syria Lebanon Landscapes Archaeological Sites/Artifacts Postcards Travel Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
